name: dynamicgl
description: GPU-accelerated charting framework for real-time data

scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/core build && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/charts build && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/theme build && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/react build
scripts.publish:packages: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/core publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/charts publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/theme publish --access public --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @dynamicgl/react publish --access public --no-git-checks
